title: Enhancing Hospitality Practical Competencies: Phenomenological Approach for Strengthening Blended Library Science Practical Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Core library science theory and practical experience in information services
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain the four types of blended librarianship models (transcendent, partial, intermittent, aspirational) through actual case analysis
Learners can design practical collaboration scenarios applying the LPP (Legitimate Peripheral Participation) theory and validate them according to evaluation criteria
Learners can complete practical tasks using blended education technology tools (digital curation systems, virtual reference services, etc.) with over 80% completion accuracy
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
